name: Virus Executable File
summary: Learn about .VEXE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: If you have a VEXE file on your system, it is recommended that you scan the file using and antivirus program.

description: Executable file that contains a virus; renamed from .EXE to ".vexe," where "v" stands for virus; may have been renamed manually or by an antivirus program; may have been distributed through malware programs on infected computers.
